General.Name: Urban Logistics Reit PLC
General.Description: Urban Logistics REIT plc (the Company) and its subsidiaries (the Group) carry on the business of property lettings throughout the United Kingdom. The Company is a public limited company incorporated and domiciled in England and Wales and listed on the Main Market of the London Stock Exchange. The registered office address is 6th Floor, 65 Gresham Street, London EC2V 7NQ.
General.Address: 124 Sloane Street, London, United Kingdom, SW1X 9BW
